title: Merperson Medium Skin Tone
description: A mythical creature with the upper body of a huperson and the tail of a fish, depicted with a medium skin tone. Represents fantasy, the ocean, and magical beings.
apple_vendor_description: The merperson emoji on Apple devices is a captivating depiction, with its medium skin tone shimmering under realistic lighting that accentuates the smooth, glossy texture of its scaled tail. Apple's design language imbues it with graceful curves and a gentle, flowing form, bringing this mythical creature to life. Symbolizing mystery, enchantment, and the allure of the ocean, it adds a touch of fantasy to messages.
